title: Phase 3: VAD-based Chunked Streaming
description: Implement VAD-based chunked streaming to resolve long audio accuracy degradation.

steps.description: Modify DictationEngine.swift to accumulate transcriptions across VAD segments.
Update WhisperKitService.swift and LocalTranscriptionService.swift to support context conditioning between chunks.

title: Phase 4: Context Awareness
description: Capture active window context to improve transcription accuracy.

steps.description: Implement ContextManager to capture active window title and bundle ID.
Pass captured context as prompt to TranscriptionManager and providers.

title: Phase 5: Polish & Ship
description: Implement Settings UI, Onboarding, and Final Polish.

steps.description: Create Settings UI for Model selection and Mic sensitivity.
Implement Onboarding flow for Permissions (Accessibility, Microphone).
Prepare for signed release and notarization.
